attributes.additional_details: The shocking brutal murder of an innocent un-armed man yesterday in broad daylight and with clear undisputed evidence and those people who commit similar barbaric acts of terror and death against the people of the UK should be put to death. Life and prison sentences is no justice for these animals. Such animals should not be allowed to live out their lives in the comfort of prisons being funded by the tax payer. Such animals should be put on trial and executed. This is a petition to open up the debate in Parliament to re-instate the death penalty.
